page.title: 12Tourism in The Valley
page.content: Most tourists visit the area to paint,ramble bird watch ,visit the chichester festival theatre,go racing at Goodwood or vist stately homes. At Goodwood race course the Caravan Club run a touring caravan site. This can accomodate eightysix vans and tents. It is open from Easter to late september. A warden and his wife live on site. Thw Woodstock Hotel Charlton has eleven double and three single bedrooms. It offers full board and is open nine months of the year. Foxhall Charlton has been restored and is now available for holiday lets from the Landmark Trust.
